title: Microsoft Unveils New Azure AI Safety Features to Shield Against AI Hallucinations
description: Microsoft has pushed an advanced toolkit of features to enhance the security of the Azure AI platform. title: Billionaire Michael Novogratz Regrets Not Jumping on Dogwifhat (WIF)
description:
American billionaire crypto investor Michael Novogratz has wittily expressed regrets for not holding the fastest-growing Solana meme coin, Dogwifhat (WIF). Novogratz made the remark at a recent conference in Manhattan as captured in a recent report by Bloomberg. The conference was about Bitcoin’s surge into mainstream investing.
